Title: Russ Miller
Body: Date: Thu, 21 Nov 1996 19:48:24 GMT Server: Apache/1.1.1 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 4206 Last-modified: Thu, 14 Nov 1996 19:21:25 GMT Russ Miller Russ Miller Russ Miller, Professor Russ Miller is Professor of Computer Science at SUNY-Buffalo Senior Research Scientist at the Hauptman-Woodward Medical Research Institute Managing partner of CRS Web Solutions He received a B.S, M.A., and Ph.D. from the Department of Mathematical Sciences, SUNY-Binghamton , in 1980, 1982, and 1985, respectively.
